fieldUpdates.description: Updates Total Quantity to Order Quantity + 2% or + 5% if Kickstarter or 0% if Gotta Groove
fieldUpdates.name: Calculate Total Quantity 1

fieldUpdates.literalValue: Standard Hard Copy Proofing - 1 Press Sheet
fieldUpdates.name: Calculator Proofing Method Update

fieldUpdates.formula: ( IF(AND(Product_Purchase_Cost1__c > 0,Product_Purchase_Cost1__c < 400), 0.80, IF(AND(Product_Purchase_Cost1__c >= 400,Product_Purchase_Cost1__c < 450), 0.75, IF(AND(Product_Purchase_Cost1__c >= 450,Product_Purchase_Cost1__c < 500), 0.70, IF(AND(Product_Purchase_Cost1__c >= 500,Product_Purchase_Cost1__c < 550), 0.65, IF(AND(Product_Purchase_Cost1__c >= IF(AND(Product_Purchase_Cost1__c >= 2500,Product_Purchase_Cost1__c < 3000), 0.39, IF(AND(Product_Purchase_Cost1__c >= 3000,Product_Purchase_Cost1__c < 3500), 0.38, IF(AND(Product_Purchase_Cost1__c >= 3500,Product_Purchase_Cost1__c < 4000), 0.37, IF(AND(Product_Purchase_Cost1__c >= 4000,Product_Purchase_Cost1__c < 5000), 0.36, IF(AND(Product_Purchase_Cost1__c >= 5000,Product_Purchase_Cost1__c < 6000), 0.35, IF(AND(Product_Purchase_Cost1__c >= 6000,Product_Purchase_Cost1__c < 7000), 0.34, IF(AND(Product_Purchase_Cost1__c >= 7000,Product_Purchase_Cost1__c < 8000), 0.33, IF(AND(Product_Purchase_Cost1__c >= 8000,Product_Purchase_Cost1__c < 9000), 0.32, IF(AND(Product_Purchase_Cost1__c >= 9000,Product_Purchase_Cost1__c < 10000), 0.31, IF(AND(Product_Purchase_Cost1__c >= 10000,Product_Purchase_Cost1__c < 12500), 0.30, IF(AND(Product_Purchase_Cost1__c >= 12500,Product_Purchase_Cost1__c < 15000), 0.29, IF(AND(Product_Purchase_Cost1__c >= 15000,Product_Purchase_Cost1__c < 17500), 0.28, IF(AND(Product_Purchase_Cost1__c >= 17500,Product_Purchase_Cost1__c < 20000), 0.27, IF(AND(Product_Purchase_Cost1__c >= 20000,Product_Purchase_Cost1__c < 25000), 0.26, IF(AND(Product_Purchase_Cost1__c >= 25000,Product_Purchase_Cost1__c < 30000), 0.25, IF(AND(Product_Purchase_Cost1__c >= 30000,Product_Purchase_Cost1__c < 40000), 0.24, IF(AND(Product_Purchase_Cost1__c >= 40000,Product_Purchase_Cost1__c < 50000), 0.23, IF(Product_Purchase_Cost1__c >= 50000, 0.22, 0 ))))))))))))))))))))))))))) ) + ( IF(ISPICKVAL(PRN_bindingtype__c,"Perfect (Softcover)"),0.01, IF(ISPICKVAL(PRN_bindingtype__c,"Case (Hardcover)"),0.02, IF(ISPICKVAL(PRN_bindingtype__c,"Wire binding"),0.03, IF(ISPICKVAL(PRN_bindingtype__c,"Spiral binding"),0.03, IF(ISPICKVAL(PRN_bindingtype__c,"Board Book"),0.05,0 ))))) )

fieldUpdates.name: Product Mark-Up 4

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( AND(ISNUMBER(ShippingPostalCode),VALUE(ShippingPostalCode) >= 90001,VALUE(ShippingPostalCode) <= 96162), ((Product_i_Price1__c + Add_On_Price_1__c) * 0.0925), IF( OR( ShippingCountry = "Canada", ShippingCountry = "CA" ), ((Product_i_Price1__c + Add_On_Price_1__c + Proofing_Price_1__c ) * 0.06), IF( AND( ISNUMBER(ShippingPostalCode), VALUE(ShippingPostalCode) >= 60001, VALUE(ShippingPostalCode) <= 62999 ), ((Product_i_Price1__c + Add_On_Price_1__c) * 0.10), 0 ) ) )
fieldUpdates.name: Tax 1

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( AND(ISNUMBER(ShippingPostalCode),VALUE(ShippingPostalCode) >= 90001,VALUE(ShippingPostalCode) <= 96162), ((Product_i_Price2__c + Add_On_Price_2__c) * 0.0925), IF( OR( ShippingCountry = "Canada", ShippingCountry = "CA" ), ((Product_i_Price2__c + Add_On_Price_2__c) * 0.06), IF( AND( ISNUMBER(ShippingPostalCode), VALUE(ShippingPostalCode) >= 60001, VALUE(ShippingPostalCode) <= 62999 ), ((Product_i_Price2__c + Add_On_Price_2__c) * 0.10), 0 ) ) )
fieldUpdates.name: Tax 2

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( AND(ISNUMBER(ShippingPostalCode),VALUE(ShippingPostalCode) >= 90001,VALUE(ShippingPostalCode) <= 96162), ((Product_i_Price3__c + Add_On_Price_3__c) * 0.0925), IF( OR( ShippingCountry = "Canada", ShippingCountry = "CA" ), ((Product_i_Price3__c + Add_On_Price_3__c) * 0.06), IF( AND( ISNUMBER(ShippingPostalCode), VALUE(ShippingPostalCode) >= 60001, VALUE(ShippingPostalCode) <= 62999 ), ((Product_i_Price3__c + Add_On_Price_3__c) * 0.10), 0 ) ) )
fieldUpdates.name: Tax 3

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( AND(ISNUMBER(ShippingPostalCode),VALUE(ShippingPostalCode) >= 90001,VALUE(ShippingPostalCode) <= 96162), ((Product_i_Price4__c + Add_On_Price_4__c) * 0.0925), IF( OR( ShippingCountry = "Canada", ShippingCountry = "CA" ), ((Product_i_Price4__c + Add_On_Price_4__c) * 0.06), IF( AND( ISNUMBER(ShippingPostalCode), VALUE(ShippingPostalCode) >= 60001, VALUE(ShippingPostalCode) <= 62999 ), ((Product_i_Price4__c + Add_On_Price_4__c) * 0.10), 0 ) ) )
fieldUpdates.name: Tax 4

fieldUpdates.description: Update unspecified board book corners to rounded
fieldUpdates.name: Update Corners for Board Books

fieldUpdates.description: Updates Head & Tail Bands to Yellow & Red for casebound books of more than 60 pages with nothing specific selected
fieldUpdates.name: Update Head & Tail Bands Default

rules.formula: OR( ISCHANGED(Product_i_Price1__c), ISCHANGED(Add_On_Price_1__c), ISCHANGED(ShippingPostalCode), ISCHANGED(ShippingCountry), ISNEW() )
OR( ISCHANGED(Product_i_Price2__c), ISCHANGED(Add_On_Price_2__c), ISCHANGED(ShippingPostalCode), ISCHANGED(ShippingCountry), ISNEW() )
OR( ISCHANGED(Product_i_Price3__c), ISCHANGED(Add_On_Price_3__c), ISCHANGED(ShippingPostalCode), ISCHANGED(ShippingCountry), ISNEW() )
OR( ISCHANGED(Product_i_Price4__c), ISCHANGED(Add_On_Price_4__c), ISCHANGED(ShippingPostalCode), ISCHANGED(ShippingCountry), ISNEW() )

rules.description: Updates Board Book orders to rounded corners by default
Updates Head & Tail bands to Red & Yellow for casebound books of more than 60 pages
Edits promotion field in Quote if the order is eligible for a 5% overrun.
Sends task to opportunity owner when customer requests specialty add-on quote through calculator.
Creates a task for opportunity owner to contact requester of sample pack

rules.fullName: Update Proofing From Calculator To New Methods
rules.description: This workflow automatically updates a field.
Customer has indicated they would like more information about our Warehousing & Fulfillment options

tasks.description: This customer has indicated interest in our warehousing & fulfillment options, reach out to them to discuss
tasks.subject: Contact customer about Warehousing & Fulfillment

tasks.description: This order has split binding. Since the page count is under 60 we will need to add separated endsheets to the hardcover. Otherwise, we will have to print the inside pages separately for each book, which negates the cost savings of a split binding order.
tasks.subject: Low Page Count Split Binding

tasks.description: Quote the specialty add-ons the customer has requested.
tasks.subject: Quote Specialty Add-Ons
